Gre Words Day 9

11 May 2017

abnegation

  • n.
    • 克己；自制；放弃

#### guilelessness - adj. - 不狡猾的；诚实的

#### trenchancy - n. - 锐利

#### obtuseness 感觉迟钝

#### mendacity - n. - 虚假；撒谎
